alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 1:41PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Garland and eastern Montgomery Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 140 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Lake Ouachita State Park, or 18 miles northeast of Mount Ida, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Pine... Lake Ouachita State Park... Avant... Lena Landing Rec Area... Mt Tabor... Hamilton... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations
